title: Kane Brown In-Studio on Why He and His Wife Hid Their Latest Pregnancy + Eddie Wants to Know If His Kids Should Stop Saying “Sucks” + Bobby’s Mailbag: Guy Finds Out He Has Twins After A Phone Call
itunes:title: Kane Brown In-Studio on Why He and His Wife Hid Their Latest Pregnancy + Eddie Wants to Know If His Kids Should Stop Saying “Sucks” + Bobby’s Mailbag: Guy Finds Out He Has Twins After A Phone Call
description:
Kane Brown stops by as The Friday Morning Conversation and talks about the Georgia win, getting in shape, and why he and his wife decided to keep their latest pregnancy. Eddie said hearing his kids say “sucks” didn’t sit right with him. He asks us if we think it’s a ‘bad word’? In the mailbag, Bobby reads an email from a listener who just found out his ex had twins that are his. He wants to know what we would suggest as his next step.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
